entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
